Created by Yumeng Yang on 27/11/2018

FUNCTIONALITY
————————
This project define a MDP problem for a generic grid world.

GENERAL USAGE NOTES
—————————————
Format of input:
- First Two Number: Rows and Colums
- Then followed by the reward matrix, 0 is walls, -1 and 1 are terminal state, others are non-terminal states
- The following two numbers are gammar and epsilon
- The last four numbers are transition model, they are the possibility of going from start state, clockwise. 0.8,0.1,0.1,0 means that the possibility of going forward is 0.8, going right is 0.1, going backward is 0.1, going left is 0;


ATTACHMENT
——————————
This is the result of input: -0.04,-0.04,-0.04,-0.04,-0.04,0,-0.04,-1,-0.04,-0.04,-0.04,1,0.1,0.001
